content.body: sure, as long as when publishing a new spec someone makes sure that it's not wrongly marked as current work
got https://github.com/nektro/zig-whatwg-url to pass 100% of `urltestdata.json` and `IdnaTestV2.json` (w/ base included this time)

content.body: What's up with https://www.w3.org/TR/xml/#NT-NameStartChar claiming that names in XML can start with ":"?
https://www.w3.org/TR/xml-names/#orphans seems to touch on this, but is non-normative...
